oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 2002 June 16
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a homecoming service with a theme of "Believers are Doers." While congregants do not handle serpents in this recording, there is footage of serpents enclosed in boxes. The videographers open the recording by visually surveying the church building and surrounding land for approximately 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Homecoming; Pentecostal preaching; Singing -- Religious aspects; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Dunn, Rayford; Eslinger, Cecil; Roberts, Nola Faye; Smith, Parker; Summerford, Billy; Summerford, Joyce
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:rightsHolder: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
